pageProps.title: Learning
pageProps.content:
Before starting learning I try to answer the following questions.
It is important to ask and answer the questions in this order.

### 1. Why should I learn?
What is my end goal? Do I really need it? Are there other ways to achieve it?
### 2. What should I learn?
What exactly should I learn? Am I sure?
### 3. How should I learn?
Should I read a related book or find a mentor or ask a colleague to help?
### 4. How should I practice it?
Do I have a safe way to practice and make mistakes?
